description:
The 15th Japanese Escape Games series!!

GAME SYSTEM
This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).
*Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and this game goes on.

The new feature 'MEMORY' is available from this piece

STORY
In a Shopping street where Japanese NEKOSAMAs live...
The theft group of 3 cats have stolen canned cat food from a store.
Explore the shopping district and Get back the canned food.
name: Japanese NEKOSAMA Games The Outlaws
intro:
Get back the stolen canned cat food
And Save cats' food crisis!
